Megaton watched the action intently wondering how everybody could ignore a
50 foot dragon. He stomped the ground shaking the wartorn battlefield. He
saw some bots aproaching from different directions. (Lunarpine and
Grimmler.)

Lunarpine reached Megaton first, the wolfbot looked up in awe at what was
before him. "You're a creation of Veratis, correct?"

The dragon looked down, wondering what stood before him. "I was created by
him, I am my own bot now." He puffed a cloud of smoke down at the smaller
bot next to him. "The Predacon files tell me nothing about you, do you cower
at the thought of battle?"

Lunarpine didn't like being called a coward. He'd die for a cause the same
as any Maximal."I never cower." He sneered looking through the smoke.

"Then you will live a little longer," The dragon sneered back wanting to
swallow this morsel whole and let his digestion tear the bot apart. He had
more important issues at hand, "Where is your commander? I am here to talk
with someone more important than you. Maybe someone the Predacons actually
have information about."

Lunarpine was close to losing his temper, he didn't care how big this
monstrosity was he wanted it's head on his mantle. (If he had a mantle.)

The dragon just raised his head, looked off into the land and waited for
Grimmler. Though he didn't have much information about the aproaching bot at
least he knew his name.
